overview: See what it takes to make powerful, closed-door decisions amongst Lucas Entertainment’s “Barebacking Businessmen”! Ivan Gregory and Derek Parker go far beyond a business merger when they flip-fuck each other raw. JD Ryder might be young, but he demonstrates to CT Hunter he has what it takes to move up the corporate ladder. Jed Athens worships the cock of his boss, Adam Russo. And CT Hunter returns to fuck bareback with the handsome young executive, Corbin Riley.
title: Gentlemen 13: Barebacking Businessmen
